Title: Wow, a Talking Fish!
Actors: A. Belozorovich, Valeri Plotnikov, Artyom Karapetyan, Irina Kartashyova
Plot: The old man fishing catches a talking fish, which asks to let her go free. Motivated by the instruction of his grandfather: "Do good and throw it into the water. It will not be gone - good to see you back. " The old man is aware that fish unlikely to somehow be useful, but still releases her.
